name: Experience local life in Saigon and Mekong Delta with travel expert
description: Get off the beaten paths of Saigon by motorbike. Savoring the authentic cuisine of a street vendor in Saigon. Navigating the mighty Mekong River in a slow boat. Let time pass by slowly while watching sunset over the rice field in a village of Mekong Delta. Visiting the underground life world of Cu Chi Tunnels and get to know about a deep, dark past of Vietnam...
